entry.title: cbm64-flight-v0.0.5
entry.content:
Airplane game for 4 players on Commodore 64

  • Playable disk image: /cbm64/cbm64-flight-4-players-v0.0.5.d64
  • Try it out with cursor keys as joystick at https://vc64web.github.io/#openROMS=true#port2=true#https://korpiq.github.io/cbm64/cbm64-flight-4-players-v0.0.5.prg
  • Source https://github.com/korpiq/cbm64-flight
  • Version 0.0.5 published at 2025-11-04T20:54:45+02:00
entry.summary: Airplane game for 4 players on Commodore 64
